      boolean delComment(String statusId)
      delete all statusId related comments
      boolean postComment(String statusId, String msg, String sid)

    • Method Detail

      • showCommentList

        List<Comment> showCommentList(String statusId)
        This method finds all comments for this status according to the status id entered.
        Returns:
        List of Comment , All comments in the tb_comment, that the status_id is same as params.
        Author:
        Yunzhou Liu
        Create Date:
        2023-1-14
        Parameters:
        The id of Status

      • postComment

        boolean postComment(String statusId,
                    String msg,
                    String sid)
        This method combines the input parameters into a comment and uploads it to the database.
        Returns:
        boolean, If it is true, the comment is sent successfully. If it is false, the comment is sent failed.
        Author:
        Yunzhou Liu
        Create Date:
        2023-1-14
        Parameters:
        ,The id of Status, , The id of user who send this comment, , The message who want to send
